name: simplerak
description: Simplement affiche le menu du rak du jour et des suivants.

scripts.sign: cp "$APK-unsigned.apk" "$APK-signed.apk" && zip -d "$APK-signed.apk" "res/drawable-land-*" "res/drawable-port-*" && jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -storepass "$STOREPASS" -keypass "$KEYPASS" -digestalg SHA1 -keystore "$KEYSTORE" "$APK-signed.apk" simplerak && zipalign -v 4 "$APK-signed.apk" "$APK-signed-aligned.apk" && jarsigner -verify -verbose -certs "$APK-signed-aligned.apk"
scripts.install: cordova platform add android browser | npm run install-lib
scripts.install-lib: rm -Rf www/lib/materialize-css www/lib/jquery.min.js && cp -R node_modules/materialize-css/dist/ www/lib/materialize-css/ && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js www/lib/jquery.min.js
